title: ‘Was rare football photograph signed by David Beckham and Ryan Giggs stolen by a Hermes employee?’
text:
Has a company treated you unfairly? Our consumer champion, Katie Morley, is here to help. For how to contact her click here.

Dear Katie,

I posted a very rare signed football picture from the class of ’92 with signatures from David Beckham and Ryan Giggs.

It was going to be auctioned for Great Ormond Street children’s hospital. The value was nearly £700. I was shocked when it was stolen at the Hermes depot by a member of staff. I was told it was my fault for not buying insurance.

Hermes had the audacity to email me 27 minutes after it realised my parcel was missing to say it had done an “extensive investigation” and could not find my package. How on earth could it do an extensive investigation...
description: Has a company treated you unfairly?
